section.heading: Supervised administration; interim orders; distribution and closing orders.
section.text: Unless otherwise ordered by the Court, supervised administration is terminated by order in accordance with the provisions of section 20-1301 . Interim orders granting other relief may be issued by the Court at any time during the pendency of a supervised administration on the application of the personal representative or any interested person.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Application of Law 10-241: See Application of Law 10-241 and Emergency act amendment notes to § 20-401.
